chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Module Nat := Struct Definition t : Set. Definition zero : nat. Definition one : nat. Definition two : nat. Definition succ : nat -> nat. Definition pred : nat -> nat. Definition add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition double : nat -> nat. Definition mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition sub : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition eqb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition leb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition ltb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition compare : nat -> nat -> comparison. Definition max : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition min : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition even : nat -> bool. Definition odd : nat -> bool. Definition pow : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_addmul : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_mul
Notation max := Init.Nat.max
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Module Init := Struct Definition Unconvertible : forall A : Type, A -> A -> Set. Definition unconvertible : forall (A : Type) (a b : A), Unconvertible A a b -> unit. End 
Notation min := Init.Nat.min
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
negb = fun b : bool => if b then false else true : bool -> bool Arguments negb _%bool_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Nat.min_le_compat_l : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> Nat.min p n <= Nat.min p m
Nat.max_le_compat_l : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> Nat.max p n <= Nat.max p m
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.max_le_iff : forall n m p : nat, p <= Nat.max n m < -> p <= n \/ p <= m
Nat.min_le_iff : forall n m p : nat, Nat.min n m <= p < -> n <= p \/ m <= p
Nat.min_l : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> Nat.min n m = n
Nat.max_l : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> Nat.max n m = n
Nat.le_min_r : forall n m : nat, Nat.min n m <= m
Nat.max_min_disassoc : forall n m p : nat, Nat.min n (Nat.max m p) <= Nat.max (Nat.min n m) p
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
Nat.min_spec : forall n m : nat, n < m /\ Nat.min n m = n \/ m <= n /\ Nat.min n m = m
Nat.max_spec : forall n m : nat, n < m /\ Nat.max n m = m \/ m <= n /\ Nat.max n m = n

current_term_gt_zero = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (nwState net h) <> Follower -> 1 <= currentTerm (nwState net h) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments current_term_gt_zero {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

handleAppendEntries_log_detailed : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st /\ log st' = log st \/ leaderId st' <> None /\ currentTerm st' = t /\ commitIndex st' = Init.Nat.max (commitIndex st) (Init.Nat.min ci (maxIndex es)) /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ t >= currentTerm st /\ log st' = es /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = Some e /\ eTerm e <> maxTerm...
advanceCurrentTerm_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), currentTerm st <= t -> currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = t

match_index_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (leader : Net.name) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> eIndex e <= assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (snd (nwState net leader))) h 0 -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments match_index_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
